name: Update the name of the storie of a project with characters long in name -- @1.4

steps.name: Given I set up a "PUT" request to "/projects/{proj_id}/stories/{stories_id}" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "200" status code as response
And I verify the story schema
And Sent Data should be the same info of the response
And I get the same json and compare with the modified json story

parameters.name: description
parameters.value: "Updated the description with a description long for the storie of a project"

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional test Positive cases of stories of a project for update
